channel.title: Adding Skill XP [PI]
channel.description: OK, so its been a while since I've done anything like this (over a year) and I forget how to do it... So I want to add when you summon the monster it gives summoning xp. The player skill is 22. I also have in the skill set up and have that thing in the config. SUMMONING_EXPERIENCE
